title: Migration help page
description: Create database tables, test data and more

line1.description: Creates table structure creator stored in /App/Database/Tables/
line1.option: --onlytable: Creates ONLY table structure for [table-name] stored in /App/Database/Tables/[Table_name]/Table
line1.option: --data: Creates table structure and data filler for [table-name] stored in /App/Database/Tables/[Table_name]
line1.option: --onlydata: Creates ONLY data filler for [table-name] stored in /App/Database/Tables/[Table_name]/Data
line1.option: --caller: Creates table caller for [table-name] stored in /App/Database/Tables/[Table_name]
line1.example:
php lora dbtable:create my-table --data 	 php lora migrate:create auth --caller 
 			 php lora migrate:create news_users --data folder=news

line2.argument: --clear: If argument is --clear -> migrate with truncating tables first
